# Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(quanteda)
library(quanteda.corpora)
library(quanteda.textplots)
library(quanteda.textstats)
library(quanteda.sentiment)
library(tm)
library(tidytext)
```

# Reading in the data

```{r}
comments_data <- read_csv("../data/pdfcomments_scraped.csv") # replace with the file with attachments
comments_corpus <- corpus(comments_data$commentText)
```

# Basic checks

```{r}
comments_tokens <- tokens(
  x = comments_corpus,
  what = "word",
  remove_punct = TRUE
)

dfm(comments_tokens,
    tolower = TRUE) %>% colSums() %>% sort(decreasing = TRUE) %>%
  as.data.frame()
```
